00045 #ifndef _USB_DFU_H_
00046 #define _USB_DFU_H_
00047 
00048 
00049 //_____ I N C L U D E S ____________________________________________________
00050 
00051 #include "conf_usb.h"
00052 
00053 #if USB_DEVICE_FEATURE == DISABLED
00054   #error usb_dfu.h is #included although USB_DEVICE_FEATURE is disabled
00055 #endif
00056 
00057 
00058 #include "compiler.h"
00059 
00060 
00061 //_____ M A C R O S ________________________________________________________
00062 
00063 // DFU status
00064 #define STATUS_OK                     0x00
00065 #define STATUS_errTARGET              0x01
00066 #define STATUS_errFILE                0x02
00067 #define STATUS_errWRITE               0x03
00068 #define STATUS_errERASE               0x04
00069 #define STATUS_errCHECK_ERASED        0x05
00070 #define STATUS_errPROG                0x06
00071 #define STATUS_errVERIFY              0x07
00072 #define STATUS_errADDRESS             0x08
00073 #define STATUS_errNOTDONE             0x09
00074 #define STATUS_errFIRMWARE            0x0A
00075 #define STATUS_errVENDOR              0x0B
00076 #define STATUS_errUSBR                0x0C
00077 #define STATUS_errPOR                 0x0D
00078 #define STATUS_errUNKNOWN             0x0E
00079 #define STATUS_errSTALLEDPKT          0x0F
00080 
00081 // DFU state
00082 #define STATE_appIDLE                 0x00
00083 #define STATE_appDETACH               0x01
00084 #define STATE_dfuIDLE                 0x02
00085 #define STATE_dfuDNLOAD_SYNC          0x03
00086 #define STATE_dfuDNBUSY               0x04
00087 #define STATE_dfuDNLOAD_IDLE          0x05
00088 #define STATE_dfuMANIFEST_SYNC        0x06
00089 #define STATE_dfuMANIFEST             0x07
00090 #define STATE_dfuMANIFEST_WAIT_RESET  0x08
00091 #define STATE_dfuUPLOAD_IDLE          0x09
00092 #define STATE_dfuERROR                0x0A
00093 
00094 
00095 //_____ D E C L A R A T I O N S ____________________________________________
00096 
00097 extern U8 usb_dfu_status;
00098 extern U8 usb_dfu_state;
00099 
00100 extern void usb_dfu_init(void);
00101 extern Bool usb_dfu_dnload(void);
00102 extern Bool usb_dfu_upload(void);
